scripts.db:start: docker stop workpal2025 || true && docker rm workpal2025 || true && docker run --name workpal2025 -e MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD=password -e MYSQL_DATABASE=workpal2025 -d -p 3306:3306 mysql
scripts.db:reset: docker exec -i workpal2025 mysql -u root -ppassword workpal2025 < ./src/scripts/reset.sql
scripts.db:seed:core: docker exec -i workpal2025 mysql -u root -ppassword workpal2025 < ./src/scripts/seed.sql
scripts.db:seed: npm run db:reset && npm run db:mig && npm run db:seed:core
